attributes.review: this app is absolutely terrible. It takes at least a week to download!!!! I kept on getting too many notifications and I was busing watering my pool. I was very unhappy and I would like to say this app is very horrible. It is very disturbing and I just wanted to support our wonderful president but this app just wasn’t it.
attributes.title: ABSOLUTELY TERRIBLE

attributes.review: This app took WAY too long to download! Horrible user interface, very difficult to navigate, ads all over the place, slow connection, sometimes it won’t even open properly or shuts down my phone. All around 0 star application
attributes.title: Horrible

attributes.review: I was really excited to download this app because I’m a frequent traveler and I needed a new way to spread hate. It took 9 hours to download and whenever I tried to open the app, it would glitch and take me back to my home screen. At least I have Trumps NH rally to look forward to! 🧜‍♀️🦄🌸🌈🎭🧚‍♂️
attributes.title: So disappointed

attributes.review: As soon as I downloaded this app, Donald himself kicked down my door and curb stomped me. Once I came to, Ivanka threw my head into the wall. Melania then came in and attempted to bite me, but when she opened her mouth the botox came undone. The weight of her nasty wrinkley skin made her fall to the floor. I am scarred for life and now have to pay thousands to see a therapist every week.
attributes.title: TERRIBLE

attributes.review: Absolutely terrible. Heinous in content, poorly made, and all around disgusting. I was horrified to see how bad this app was and if I could rate it zero stars, believe me, I would. This app should be banned from the app store permanently for the good of mankind. Downloading this app was the worst decision I have ever made in my life.
attributes.title: The most horrendous app I've ever used

attributes.review:
ok so first of all- this app had the AUDACITY to not even download. idk if it’s just me but.. THAT SOUNDS LIKE A PROBLEM 😡 second of all, the MILLISECOND, and when I say “MILLISECOND” I mean the millisecond, i open it up IT GIVES ME HIV. third of all, HIV IS BASICALLY UNCURABLE- fourth of all, its an app supporting trump so what can you expect. under ANY circumstances: DO. NOT. DOWNLOAD. THIS. APP. 
you will get hiv and you will die.

thank you,
- sincerely, Barron Trump
attributes.title: ONE STAR

attributes.review: I can’t believe Apple would absolutely let an app like this be in the App Store. What app has ever crashed a brand new iPhone 11 max pro. This is ridiculous I had to plug my phone up to my Mac just to fix it. I don’t want anyone else to experience what I did with this app please remove it.
attributes.title: This app is ridiculous

attributes.review: This app caused a major problem with my phone as it downloaded. It started to glitch. It took a large amount of time to download, and many of the features/user design is less than adequate. Very disappointed, but Trump 2020 nonetheless
attributes.title: Disappointing App (technical glitch and download time)

attributes.review: first off, this app took 58 hours to download! and when it finally downloaded, it wasn’t even worth it because it immediately asked for my phone number, and then hacked my phone!!!!!! this is a DISGRACE!!!! my phone was so hacked that it ended up EXPLODING! and then i had to by a whole new phone! i am very disappointing!
attributes.title: DANGER!!!!

attributes.review: the trump app is quite unusable. i can even use it. i open the app and i’m overrun with obviously biased and u true sentiments. if i want news i’ll go to an unbiased source with credibility. don’t get me wrong, i LOVE trump, but his app is an abomination to our country. save yourself time and don’t even bother downloading this app.
attributes.title: absolutely unusable app
